snippet: Scott M. Stringer’s opponent in the primary for comptroller, Eliot Spitzer, is viewed as the front-runner primarily because of strong support among black voters.
abstract: Trailside blog; Scott M Stringer is stepping up efforts to reach black voters as polls show Eliot Spitzer leading in Democratic primary for New York City comptroller, buoyed by strong support among African-Americans.
lead_paragraph: Scott M. Stringer’s opponent in the primary for comptroller, Eliot Spitzer, is viewed as the front-runner primarily because of strong support among black voters.

headline.main: Trailing in Polls, Stringer Woos Black Voters
